# PED::SET_PED_COMBAT_RANGE

## Summary
Sets the range that the ped will combat the target

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **COMBAT_RANGE** combatRange

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
enum eCombatRange // 0xB69160F5
{
	CR_Near,
	CR_Medium,
	CR_Far,
	CR_VeryFar,
	CR_NumRanges
};
